overview: Woo-yeol and Miho, who work part-time in a motel, are a couple and live part-time in a motel. However, Mi-ho has a secret meeting with Ji-sung, the boss, secretly for the sake of superiority, and Suzy, who sees this, goes to him and informs him of the fact. Suzy meets and comforts poor Woo-yeol, and Woo-yeol carefully asks Mi-ho, but in the end decides to trust Mi-ho and keep her relationship with Ji-sung a secret.
title: What do you do when it's cheap?
